task_description: Use the LinkedIn app to search for a customer service representative position. Select a job, open Keep Notes, create a new note, record the company's name, and set the note's title to 'customer service representative'.

subtask_1.task: Search for a customer service representative position and select a job

subtask_2.task: Create a new note, record {company's name}, and set the note's title to 'customer service representative'
